alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 15 at 9:50PM EST until December 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog, mainly over higher terrain. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 3 AM to 11 PM EST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Low visibility in dense fog will lead to hazardous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts, up to 70 mph, should occur between 7 AM and noon EST on Thursday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving in fog, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
